original_title: Dhoni’s Chennai beat Gujarat to reach IPL final
original_body_lines: Spinner Ravindra Jadeja starred with bat and ball as Chennai Super Kings beat holders Gujarat Titans by 15 runs on Tuesday to reach the Indian Premier League T20 final.

Four-time winners Chennai posted 172-7, a total their bowlers defended as they dismissed Gujarat for 157 in a play-off believed to be the last home match at the M.A. Chidambaram Stadium for skipper M.S. Dhoni.

Gujarat will have another shot at making the final, which is on May 28 in Ahmedabad, when they take on the winnner of the second play-off between Lucknow Super Giants and five-time champions Mumbai Indians. (AFP)
